name: The Phone Call
description:
The phone rings out in a claustrophobic concrete hallway. Who's on the other end? There's only one way to find out - pick up the phone.

Do you have the guts, or will you let the timer run out?

(note: this is a joke game - don't take it too seriously!)

Updated 11/12/2021 - fixed missing phone audio (ringing, pickup sfx), added start screen with basic info on controls

Created for the One-Minute Jam.
